SOCY 105: Introduction to Contemporary Social Problems

This online course tutorial will assist researchers in locating resources about today's social issues.

Addressing Your Research Needs

Otis Chadley
Subjects:African American Studies, Anthropology, Family Science, Psychology, Sociology

Welcome!

This online course tutorial will assist students of SOCY 105: Introduction to Contemporary Social Problems.  It will help you in locating print and electronic resources that discuss contemporary social issues. The online publication covers social problems on a national and international basis.  Also, the tutorial includes tips on how to prepare an annotated bibliography.  In addition, a list of current social issues are included for your browsing pleasure.  Click on the tab entitled "Examples of Contemporary Social Problems".  Always consult with your course instructor for specific requirements regarding your assignments.
